list-item.p:
There is neither prevention nor treatment available.
72
The disease is transmitted by an Aedes-type mosquito. There is no human-to-human transmission.
Overall, 1.9 million cases have been declared in Asia since 2005.
The CFR is 0, but the disease is a death cofactor in the elderly.
The disease has no occupational concentration.

The disease is not present in Europe.
73
